mapper.select: SELECT g.code AS "code", g.name AS "name", b.id AS "book_id", b.title AS "book_title", b.author AS "book_author" FROM genres g LEFT OUTER JOIN book_genres bg ON g.code = bg.genre_code LEFT OUTER JOIN books b ON bg.book_id = b.id WHERE g.code = #{code}
